1121820140713254918.text:
1/ Tesla is ~4 years ahead of other auto makers in self-driving silicon.

This is Nvidia's roadmap. Pegasus is the L5 dev system. The problem is its 4 chips and 500 watts—too hot & expensive. Orin will shrink Pegasus down to 2 chips so it can be deployed in robo taxis.pic.twitter.com/tPTLGMuUVY

1121822164196438018.text:
2/ Here's Tesla's self-driving computer. It is basically Nvidia's Orin but shipping *today*.

Orin's design goal is to collapse L5 perf into 2 SoCs. That's exactly what Tesla did.

Granted it's half the paper TOPs, but software efficiency likely more than makes up for it.pic.twitter.com/0X05TbRKPc
